Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 71st overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
8/9/2015: Signed a contract extension with Colorado, $20,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 4/23/2018...
Drove in 7 runs against San Francisco on 9/5/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/17/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $12,750,000 per year...
Released by Philadelphia on 8/4/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 8/9/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $4,030,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/7/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 3/17/2022 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Colorado on 7/5/2022 (Going to SLB: C Nathan Noguez. Going to COL: 1B Rico Areytio)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/8/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
